__e: You should be the one to tell us.
I don't know. I hope she can tell us.
Well, he didn't explain it to me nor perhaps could he have. - Maybe you could tell us?
You've done so much for us already, but, well, we found something inside one of the books in Hannah's locker, and we... we don't know what it is, so I was hoping that maybe you could tell us.
- You tell us. You're the new head of security.
Hey, that's why you asked if we knew where babies came from -- because you wanted to tell us?
See why you have to tell us before you leave?
- Didn't occur to you to tell us this?
Just slip your mind to mention that to me before?
